title: Can't log in into game
body: I can log in to website just fine, but i can't login in game, it says my username and password are incorrect, i checked the region, capslock etc few times, but on website i have no problem ?

replies.body:
is this still a problem???
i can log into website just fine but i cannot log into game 
done everything OP has and ive checked my firewalls nothing on my end is preventing me from connecting atm
Good to know i am not alone... Been 3 days.

We're on the job already, but our login servers hit a few snags a little while ago. We should be back up to speed before long, but make sure to check up on the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for any updates.
I did the same... I think the server is down
